input.label: Event Option

choice.value: chart count over service_description by hostname
chart count over hostname by service_description

input.default: chart count over service_description by hostname

search.query: index="centreon" category=1 element=24 hostname=$hostname$ service_description=$service_description$ state_type=$state_type$ $state$ | eval state=case(state == 0, "OK", state == 1, "WARNING", state == 2, "CRITICAL", state == 3, "UNKNOWN") | eval state_type=case(state_type == 0, "SOFT", state_type == 1, "HARD") | eval state_type=case(state_type == 0, "SOFT", state_type == 1, "HARD") | $graph_option$

index="centreon" category=1 element=24 hostname=$hostname$ service_description=$service_description$ state_type=$state_type$ $state$ | eval state=case(state == 0, "OK", state == 1, "WARNING", state == 2, "CRITICAL", state == 3, "UNKNOWN") | eval state_type=case(state_type == 0, "SOFT", state_type == 1, "HARD") | table _time,hostname,service_description,output,state state_type, retry

index=centreon category=1 element=17 notification_contact!="" hostname=$hostname$ $state$ | eval state=case(state == 0, "OK", state == 1, "WARNING", state == 2, "CRITICAL", state == 3, "UNKNOWN") | chart count over service_description by state

index=centreon category=1 element=17 notification_contact!="" hostname=$hostname$ $state$ | eval state=if(isnotnull(service_description),case(state == 0, "OK", state == 1, "WARNING", state == 2, "CRITICAL", state == 3, "UNKNOWN"),case(state == 0, "UP", state == 1, "DOWN")) | table _time,hostname,service_description,state,notification_contact,output,
